Texts.Eng:
Personable cat-people. Light on their feet and quick to regain their stamina, they excel in close quarters despite their frailty, and are hardened against the forces of nature.

Diet: Omnivore, can eat raw meat.

^orange;Perks^reset;:
Glowing Body
+^green;10^reset;% Jump, ^green;-20^reset;% Fall Damage, +^green;5^reset;% Speed
^green;-20^reset;% Energy Regen Block Time
+^green;20^reset;% Fire, Electric, Ice and Poison resist

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
Fist: +^green;2^reset;% Crit, +^green;5^reset;% Damage
Shortsword/Dagger: +^green;10^reset;% Damage, +^green;5^reset;% Protection
 
^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
-^red;20^reset;% Physical, Shadow, Cosmic and Radiation Resist
